alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Coles; Douglas; Edgar; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 3:33PM CST until February 25 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches and ice accumulations of less than one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Champaign, Coles, Douglas, Edgar, and Vermilion Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow and freezing rain will continue late this afternoon and early this evening, and then gradually change over to freezing drizzle for the remainder of the evening, before ending.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com
